81018A9C540C4D52A6D396169E16C0FE.description: A shape resembling a polygon that does not share the defining geometric properties of the polygon is a close approximation.

584603B6CE354B6D87F2F9937949E59E.description: The conventional order of operations provides a set of rules for evaluating expressions, including the following: Multiplication and division are performed before addition and subtraction, Multiplication and division are performed in order from left to right and Addition and subtraction are performed in order from left to right.

92EFE7CE520C4FC193B459F9F784A55C.description: An expression can include multiple operations.

92EA1CB9011E48D4A704E1FC5FFCC520.description: Decimal numbers are fractions with denominators of 10, 100, etc.

DEC774708DA3408583945B4B900995C2.description: Decimal numbers are numbers between natural numbers.
